name: Marvellous Montpellier Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
The art of hosting at the château: our family opens the doors of the Château to you for your wedding day. Organise an authentic event in our elegant, spacious and yet intimate setting.
Elegant, spacious, and atypical, this historic monument dates to the end of the seventeenth century and adapts to your needs to create your perfect event.
The warm welcome that awaits you here is a real family tradition, combined with the efficient organisation of your day.
What we offer:
An ideally situated and prestigious venue with beautiful green surroundings
The opportunity to benefit from all the assets that the Château provides: guided tours, wine tasting, restaurant, 200 parking spaces, etc.
An apartment hotel with spa and swimming pool, in partnership with the the Château, is available for you and your guests and is just three minutes away. There are also many other hotels nearby.
A dedicated team to organise your event and accompany you throughout the entire process, including offering many choice for you catering.
Spaces: you can choose indoors or outdoors spaces, according to the season or the weather.
High definition photos are available for your invitations and other relevant documents
Reception rooms
Courtyard or garden side, the art of entertaining at the château
You will be able to host up to 500 people for your special event. Our interior and exterior spaces (the park, the courtyard, the terrace of the château, the bamboo grove, the orangery, etc) are available individually or as a package, according to your needs, and can be booked exclusively.
Getting married at our Château means you can enjoying an exceptional setting combining tradition and modernity.
The park, the orangery, the bamboo grove or the terrace of the château provide an elegant, spacious, verdant and calm ambiance to your event.
Practical information
Spaces
Large Room "les Baumelles": 140 m² - 150 seated places - 250 standing places
Vaulted Room "Champ Louis" : 50 m² - 45 seated places - 55 standing places
Vaulted Room "Champ Bouchard" : 45 m² - 36 seated places - 50 standing places
Orangery (in the gardens): 62 m² - 50 seated places - 70 standing places
Courtyard: 600m²
Gardens: 3 hectares
Château terrace: 750m²
Availability for hire : all year round.
Length of hire : half day, full day, evening.
Accessibility : international airport 10 minutes; train station 15 minutes
Equipment available: screen, floral decoration, extra sound system, Wifi, paperboard, heating, tables/chairs, video recorders, sound system, picture rail, etc. Optional services include a platform, dance floor and cloakroom (if more than 120 people).
Rates : Prices are calculated taking into account the length of the hire and the facilities used. There is also a difference between weekdays and weekends.
If you would like some more information then please do get in touch.
Photo credit: Laura Michel
